A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A failed attempt to please the new audience with poorly chosen one-liners.
It has betrayed every single character of the old franchise to make way for demonizing social problems when it really wasn't needed. 

Disney needs to understand that Star Wars is a family film and that some things can be funny to both adults and children. 

This movie is beyond saving\, not even a theory of Luke being evil could even save it.
